SEARCH
Package controller.controllerCharacter.controllerHeros

Class HeroController

java.lang.Object
controller.controllerCharacter.controllerHeros.HeroController
public class HeroController extends Object
Controller class for managing the Hero character. It acts as an intermediary between the HeroModel and HeroView.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a HeroController with the specified HeroModel.
